title: Role-Play-Based Practical Language Communication Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business terminology and workplace environment comprehension
context.additional_context: A Language Proficiency Enhancement Program for Practicing Professionals, Utilizing Smartphone-Based Activities in Resource-Limited Technological Environments

learning_goals: Learners can resolve language issues occurring in real work situations with over 80% accuracy through role-playing
Learners can mitigate conflicts arising during team collaboration in simulation environments by over 70% through verbal communication
Learners can derive at least three personal development directions from reflective journals based on role-playing experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
